price: 31. Tango batiaki liboso naye bampunda ya kitoko sima ya nzanga тропа kokima mbangu,
arabic: إِذۡ عُرِضَ عَلَيۡهِ بِٱلۡعَشِيِّ ٱلصَّٰفِنَٰتُ ٱلۡجِيَادُ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: idh ʿuriḍa ʿalayhi bil-ʿashiyi al-ṣāfinātu al-jiyādu
